metadata.dc:author: Rodó Salas, J
Claret Corominas, I
metadata.dc:description: We present the case of an eleven-year old boy affected of giant hydronephrosis on a unique right pelvic kidney, treated according to an original technique consisting in the use of a free peritoneal flap for the completion of a renal banding to complement Mollard's (1973) and Stewart Hamilton's (1957) nephroplasty procedures.
metadata.dc:title: Nueva técnica de nefroplicatura en el tratamiento de las hidronefrosis graves.
[New technique of renal plication for the treatment of severe hydronephrosis].
